tool.name: GATE OrthoMatcher v2.2.0
tool.description: Add identity relations between named entities
tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds identity relations between previously identified named entities in order to perform coreference.
.. class:: infomark
**NOTE**: If input is from to this tools is the output of a pipeline of GATE tools including *GATE->GATE Gazetteer* and *GATE->GATE: NamedEntityRecognizer*, the Orthomatcher may assign an entity type to an unclassiﬁed proper name (an "Unknown"" annotation), using the type of a matching name.
**Required Annotations**
* Named Entities generated by *GATE->GATE: NamedEntityRecognizer* OR `NamedEntity <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/NamedEntity>`_
**Generated Annotations**
* A list of annotation IDs for annotations referring to the same entity as the value of the *matches* feature of any named entity annotation.` If converted to LIF using *Convert Formats->GateToLif*, the output will include NamedEntity <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/NamedEntity>`_ annotations with a list of annotation IDs for annotations referring to the same entity as the value of the *matches* feature.
